name: calendar.add_event
description: Add a new event to the user's calendar.
returns: A uid of the added event

name: calendar.add_reminder
description: Add a new reminder to the user's calendar.

time.description: A new reminder's time (ISO8601 hours:minutes:seconds format)

date.description: A new reminder's date (ISO8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) (default: ${CURRENT_DATE})

returns: A uid of the added reminder

name: calendar.edit_event
description: Change some properties of an existing event.

date.description: A new event's date (ISO8601 YYYY-MM-DD format)

time.description: A new event's time (ISO8601 hours:minutes:seconds format)

returns: A string status of the event update

name: calendar.get_all_events
description: Get all events from the user's calendar.

start.description: From which date to lookup the events (ISO8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) (default: ${CURRENT_DATE})

end.description: Until which date (inclusive) to lookup the events (ISO8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) (default: ${CURRENT_DATE})

regex.description: Optional regular expression to use for filtering events based on the name or comment properties

returns: A string result of events search

name: calendar.get_all_reminders
description: Get all reminders on the given date in the user's calendar.

date.description: The date to get all reminders for (ISO8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) (default: ${CURRENT_DATE})

name: calendar.get_event
description: Get an event by this uid.

uid.description: A unique identifier of the event needed.

name: calendar.get_reminder
description: Get a reminder by this uid.

uid.description: A unique identifier of the event needed.

name: calendar.remove_event
description: Remove an event by this uid.

uid.description: A unique identifier of the event needed.

returns: A string status of the event removal

name: calendar.remove_reminder
description: Remove a reminder by this uid.

uid.description: A unique identifier of the event needed.

returns: A string status of the reminder removal
